title: Ama Yangri-2 Days/1 Night
description: Ama Yangri is located something about 90km north of Kathmandu Valley which is highest peak that is nearest from the Captial City Kathmandu. Ama Yangri...

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Drive from Kathmandu to Chumothang Resort
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Early Morning Gather at one location our vehicle will pick up and we will be further Heading towards Chumothang Resort which takes you around 7-8 hours . after refreshment you will have camp fire and enjoy with your friend. Dinner will be serve at Hotel. Overnight at Hotel.

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Trek to Ama yangri and drive back to Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Early Morning, Before sunrise Hike to Ama yangri top to Witness the  mesmerizing sunrise with the views of Langtang Mountains range, Manasalu, and others various peak. Later hike down to Hotel have breakfast and Proceed further towards kathmandu.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure
